Key Match Events: Jon Thorsteinsson scored the opening goal for Iceland in the 12th minute
England failed to create many chances and struggled to break down Iceland's defense
Pre-Game Insights: Gareth Southgate emphasized the importance of controlling midfield possession
Experts favored England to win based on their current form
Post-Match Reflections: Gareth Southgate acknowledged that England's performance was disjointed and disappointing
John Stones had to be substituted at half time due to an injury
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was England's final warm-up game before the Euro 2024 tournament
